Articles.Content:
Can someone tell me what might causing my game to crash? it crashes upon flight launch, reset, or loading VAB.

Error file reads as follows:

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.5.2f1_9abb1b59b47c]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module KSP.exe at 0023:0042bf96.

Error occurred at 2014-11-15_131054.

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Michael.

39% memory in use.

0 MB physical memory [0 MB free].

0 MB paging file [0 MB free].

0 MB user address space [126 MB free].

Read from location 00000004 caused an access violation.

Context:

EDI: 0x00000004 ESI: 0xe3e38fc0 EAX: 0x044e0dc4

EBX: 0x0020f388 ECX: 0xfeff0030 EDX: 0xff3f0028

EIP: 0x0042bf96 EBP: 0x0020f370 SegCs: 0x00000023

EFlags: 0x00010202 ESP: 0x0020f34c SegSs: 0x0000002b

Bytes at CS:EIP:

8b 1f 89 77 fc 8b 46 08 81 e3 00 00 00 c0 c1 e8

Looks like you're running out of memory, but it's hard to tell without a complete copy of the appropriate log. Please read the How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky for where to find the right log and general advice about out of memory crashes.
